<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Looks at the phi nodes in Header for values coming from Latch. For these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions and all their operands calls Visit on them, keeping going for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all the operands in AftBlocks. Returns false if Visit returns false,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise returns true. This is used to process the instructions in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Aft blocks that need to be moved before the subloop. It is used in two</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// moveHeaderPhiOperandsToForeBlocks.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V = Phi.getIncomingValueForBlock(Latch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move the phi operands of Header from Latch out of AftBlocks to InsertLoc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="#a2d0f7c6e312d649719381f7e99424acd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a2d0f7c6e312d649719381f7e99424acd">moveHeaderPhiOperandsToForeBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Header,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Latch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> InsertLoc,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="#a057b807fba588388e9dc4f414633b4e5">BasicBlockSet</a> &amp;AftBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to ensure we move the instructions in the correct order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// starting with the earliest required instruction and moving forward.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#af765aa8813bb87e39b20ad124b06d64b">processHeaderPhiOperands</a>(Header, Latch, AftBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           &#91;&amp;AftBlocks, &amp;InsertLoc&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AftBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;moveBefore(InsertLoc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  This method performs Unroll and Jam. For a simple loop like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  for (i = ..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Fore(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    for (j = ..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      SubLoop(i, j)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Aft(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  Instead of doing normal inner or outer unrolling, we do:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  for (i = .., i+=2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Fore(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Fore(i+1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    for (j = ..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      SubLoop(i, j)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      SubLoop(i+1, j)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Aft(i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Aft(i+1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  So the outer loop is essetially unrolled and then the inner loops are fused</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  (&quot;jammed&quot;) together into a single loop. This can increase speed when there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  are loads in SubLoop that are invariant to i, as they become shared between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  the now jammed inner loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  We do this by spliting the blocks in the loop into Fore, Subloop and Aft.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  Fore blocks are those before the inner loop, Aft are those after. Normal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  Unroll code is used to copy each of these sets of blocks and the results are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  combined together into the final form above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  isSafeToUnrollAndJam should be used prior to calling this to make sure the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  unrolling will be valid. Checking profitablility is also advisable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  If EpilogueLoop is non-null, it receives the epilogue loop (if it was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  necessary to create one and not fully unrolled).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">&#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8c861ddf753ab3690437dceaadf5c7e1">LoopUnrollResult</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae45123597a5abb30853572614c1b2d4b"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae45123597a5abb30853572614c1b2d4b">llvm::UnrollAndJamLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TripCount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TripMultiple, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnrollRemainder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &#42;ORE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;&#42;EpilogueLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we enter here we should have already checked that it is safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Header = L-&gt;getHeader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Header &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No header.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Backward dependencies are only preserved if not interleaved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sequentialized;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether it is semantically safe Src and Dst considering any potential</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependency between them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param UnrollLevel The level of the loop being unrolled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @param JamLevel    The level of the loop being jammed; if Src and Dst are on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different levels, the outermost common loop counts as jammed level</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// @return true if is safe and false if there is a dependency violation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690" lineLink="#afa7cdefae294ca029d754def452709e9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#afa7cdefae294ca029d754def452709e9">checkDependency</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Src, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Dst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnrollLevel, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> JamLevel,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sequentialized, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp;DI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(UnrollLevel &lt;= JamLevel &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting JamLevel to be at least UnrollLevel&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src == Dst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore Input dependencies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Src) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Dst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether unroll-and-jam may violate a dependency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By construction, every dependency will be lexicographically non-negative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (if it was, it would violate the current execution order), such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (0,0,&gt;,&#42;,&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unroll-and-jam changes the GT execution of two executions to the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration of the chosen unroll level. That is, a GT dependence becomes a GE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependence (or EQ, if we fully unrolled the loop) at the loop&#39;s position:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (0,0,&gt;=,&#42;,&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, the dependency is not necessarily non-negative anymore, i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unroll-and-jam may violate correctness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Dependence&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = DI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo/#a49197b24cced248bed2d2c89c641a6dd">depends</a>(Src, Dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>-&gt;isOrdered() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected an output, flow or anti dep.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>-&gt;isConfused()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Confused dependency between:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Dst &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If outer levels (levels enclosing the loop being unroll-and-jammed) have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-equal direction, then the locations accessed in the inner levels cannot</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurLoopDepth = 1; CurLoopDepth &lt; UnrollLevel; ++CurLoopDepth)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the distance carried by the unrolled loop is 0, then after unrolling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that distance will become non-zero resulting in non-overlapping accesses in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ForeFirst    &lt;------\\   &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ...              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ForeFirst    &lt;----\\ |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     Blocks           | |   &#125; ForeBlocks of a inner loop of L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ForeLast          | |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |             | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    JamLoopFirst  &lt;\\  | |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     Blocks        |  | |   &#125; JamLoopBlocks of the innermost loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    JamLoopLast   -/  | |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |             | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    AftFirst          | |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     Blocks           | |   &#125; AftBlocks of a inner loop of L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    AftLast     ------/ |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ...              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    AftFirst            |   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     Blocks             |   &#125; AftBlocks of L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    AftLast     --------/   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    There are (theoretically) any number of blocks in ForeBlocks, SubLoopBlocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    and AftBlocks, providing that there is one edge from Fores to SubLoops,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    one edge from SubLoops to Afts and a single outer loop exit (from Afts).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    In practice we currently limit Aft blocks to a single block, and limit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    things further in the profitablility checks of the unroll and jam pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    Because of the way we rearrange basic blocks, we also require that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    the Fore blocks of L on all unrolled iterations are safe to move before the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    blocks of the direct child of L of all iterations. So we require that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    phi node looping operands of ForeHeader can be moved to at least the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ForeEnd, so that we can arrange cloned Fore Blocks before the subloop and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    match up Phi&#39;s correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    i.e. The old order of blocks used to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">           (F1)1 (F2)1 J1&#95;1 J1&#95;2 (A2)1 (A1)1 (F1)2 (F2)2 J2&#95;1 J2&#95;2 (A2)2 (A1)2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">         It needs to be safe to transform this to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">           (F1)1 (F1)2 (F2)1 (F2)2 J1&#95;1 J1&#95;2 J2&#95;1 J2&#95;2 (A2)1 (A2)2 (A1)1 (A1)2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    There are then a number of checks along the lines of no calls, no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    exceptions, inner loop IV is consistent, etc. Note that for loops requiring</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    runtime unrolling, UnrollRuntimeLoopRemainder can also fail in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    UnrollAndJamLoop if the trip count cannot be easily calculated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split blocks into Fore/SubLoop/Aft based on dominators</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;JamLoop = <a href="#a2d1ad27662c410b3adeb6e79e1606c97">getInnerMostLoop</a>(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a057b807fba588388e9dc4f414633b4e5">BasicBlockSet</a> SubLoopBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, BasicBlockSet&gt;</a> ForeBlocksMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, BasicBlockSet&gt;</a> AftBlocksMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a855d933ff14db67cb1158c9829edd0bc">partitionOuterLoopBlocks</a>(&#42;L, &#42;JamLoop, SubLoopBlocks, ForeBlocksMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                AftBlocksMap, DT)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Incompatible loop layout\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Aft blocks may need to move instructions to fore blocks, which becomes more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// difficult if there are multiple (potentially conditionally executed)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks. For now we just exclude loops with multiple aft blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AftBlocksMap&#91;L&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() != 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Can&#39;t currently handle &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;multiple blocks after the loop\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check inner loop backedge count is consistent on all iterations of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(L-&gt;getLoopsInPreorder(), &#91;&amp;SE&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;SubLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">        return !hasIterationCountInvariantInParent(SubLoop, SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Inner loop iteration count is &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;not consistent on each iteration\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the loop safety info for exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopsafetyinfo">SimpleLoopSafetyInfo</a> LSI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LSI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopsafetyinfo/#a262c2df9639d3f71b8d2a8158b819809">computeLoopSafetyInfo</a>(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LSI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopsafetyinfo/#aa1b6a065ad4fde175bf904917241cba9">anyBlockMayThrow</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Something may throw\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;ve ruled out the easy stuff and now need to check that there are no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interdependencies which may prevent us from moving the:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ForeBlocks before Subloop and AftBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Subloop before AftBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ForeBlock phi operands before the subloop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we can move all instructions we need to before the subloop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Header = L-&gt;getHeader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Latch = L-&gt;getLoopLatch();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a057b807fba588388e9dc4f414633b4e5">BasicBlockSet</a> AftBlocks = AftBlocksMap&#91;L&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;SubLoop = L-&gt;getSubLoops()&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#af765aa8813bb87e39b20ad124b06d64b">processHeaderPhiOperands</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Header, Latch, AftBlocks, &#91;&amp;AftBlocks, &amp;SubLoop&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SubLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a04337b572d34ea413c35dbac5d75530b">contains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AftBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we hit a phi node in afts we know we are done (probably</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LCSSA)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t move instructions with side effects or memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reads/writes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;mayHaveSideEffects() || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;mayReadOrWriteMemory())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep going</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; can&#39;t move required &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;instructions after subloop to before it\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for memory dependencies which prohibit the unrolling we are doing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because of the way we are unrolling Fore/Sub/Aft blocks, we need to check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there are no dependencies between Fore-Sub, Fore-Aft, Sub-Aft and Sub-Sub.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#ac41c50a3b85aa5098391b76548f04e3b">checkDependencies</a>(&#42;L, SubLoopBlocks, ForeBlocksMap, AftBlocksMap, DI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         LI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; failed dependency check\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
